Please people compair the filesize with other torrents before u complain. You can't probably hear any sounds because there ain't no sounds in this psx rom!

For those who are having problems (years later lawlz?) Just use "PSX EMULATOR" from emulator zone. ePSXe is crap and requires too many plugins for too many games. But "psx emulator" is self contained and works with 87% of the ps1 games out there. All of your mainstream favorites will work and doesn't require stress unlike ePSXe. I hope this helps.
Anyone having issues with choppy video or sound should burn this at 2x , playstation 1 and 2 often can't read CD's burnt at high speed.
For those looking for an ISO to burn and play on the console, this is not the case. Those are .bin and .cue file for emulators.
actually, nevermind that. These files can also be burned as images, my bad.
